title: Mask 0s
desc: Restrict CropObject masks to nonzero image pixels?

title: Auto-center
desc: Center image automatically when window size changes.

title: Recover on start
desc: MUSCIMarker will attempt to start where you left off.

title: Save on exit
desc: MUSCIMarker will attempt to remember where you are leaving off.

title: Recovery dump frequency
desc: The app state is backed up every X seconds. Set to 0 to turn recovery off.

title: Tracking root
desc: Root directory where tracking files go (into day-based folders)

title: Helper line in T. Lasso
desc: When using the Trimmed Lasso tool for larger objects, MUSCIMarker, will display a dotted line to show you how it would like to close the lasso.

title: Min. helper line length
desc: At what range should the helper line be displayed?.

title: Active Obj./Rel. selection
desc: The Obj. and Rel. Select tools will try to highlight what has been selected so far.

title: Binarization: Retain foreground
desc: If this is on, the Region Binarization tool will retain the shade of the foreground pixels.

title: Sparse CropObject threshold
desc: The alt+shift+t shortcut will select all object where more than this many foreground pixels are not a part of the mask.

title: Sparse Exclusive CropObject threshold
desc: The alt+shift+t shortcut will select all object where more than this many foreground pixels are not a part of the mask, and are not a part of any other object.
